    Buy me a coffee

    Hi! I am Sal, web designer & developer at WowThemes.net. The free items I create are my side projects and Mundana for Jekyll is one of them. You can find all the work I release for free here.

    You have my permission to use the free items I develop in your personal, commercial or client projects. If you’d like to reward my work, I would be honored and I could dedicate more time maintaining the free projects.

    Thank you so much!
